indicator_name: 개도국의 하이브리드 시스템을 포함한 재생 에너지 및 청정에너지 연구 개발과 재생에너지생산을 지원하는 국제 자금 흐름
target_name: 2030년까지 청정에너지 연구개발 이행을 위해 국제협력 강화

en.target: By 2030, enhance international cooperation to facilitate access to clean energy research and technology, including renewable energy, energy efficiency and advanced and cleaner fossil-fuel technology, and promote investment in energy infrastructure and clean energy technology
en.indicator_name: International financial flows to developing countries in support of clean energy research and development and renewable energy production, including in hybrid systems
en.un_custodian_agency: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
